body: what coding language do you use for the <pre class="btn btn-info">
body_tagged: what coding language do you use for the <pre class="btn btn-info">
title: coding question

replies.body: The code stated above is known as HTML and CSS.
replies.body_tagged: The code stated above is known as HTML and CSS.

replies.body: If I wanted to use it to code a website wood it work and what code style
replies.body_tagged: If I wanted to use it to code a website wood it work and what code style

replies.body:
You can make a website in HTML/CSS, if that's what you're asking. Use these;

HTML - http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_examples.asp
CSS - http://www.w3schools.com/css/css_examples.asp
